short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows changing the TEXTAREA input field also vertically on the YCOMBINATOR application submission page for ease of completion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The application works exclusively with the YCOMBINATOR application submission page and modifies the property of all TEXTAREAs to allow for their resizing both horizontally and vertically. Now you can review the entered text more comfortably :)
v.1.1 It works with bio-page too
